chat_explanation.message:
**How This Chatbot Works:**

üå≥ **Decision Tree Mode** - What you're experiencing now! Pre-structured conversations for quick navigation
ü§ñ **AI Mode** - Powered by OpenAI GPT with RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation)
üîç **Smart Context** - AI mode searches a knowledge base of projects, skills, and experience
üîÑ **Seamless Switching** - Move between modes based on your needs
üíæ **Persistent Memory** - Your conversation continues across sessions

The hybrid approach provides both quick answers and deep, contextual discussions!
